title: News: The Weeknd to play secret London show this Sunday
body:
**[The Weeknd](http://www.thelineofbestfit.com/artists/the-weeknd-108291) has announced a surprise London show this coming Sunday (25 November).**

Abel Tesfaye, will host a special gig at a secret West London location this weekend.

Tickets for the event are free, to enter click [here](http://www.theweeknd.co.uk/) or [here](http://www.islandrecords.co.uk/theweeknd/) and fill in the form.

Lucky winners will be notified by 9pm today (23 November).

Good Luck.
